Created an attachment (id=70849)
fix

we were calling .remove while iterating over the set of keys...not sure why we don't see this exception all the time...

No one sees this, because usually we get a call to "windowClosed(...)" which empties our collection before the shutdown occurrs. There were other SWT exceptions in the log which might have prevented the windowClosed(...) notification.
applied patch to HEAD, waiting for ruling for 3.3.1....
